title: More efficient logic needed for processing disk sorting when there is a border value for row value
OB: The current logic for processing disk sorting with a border value for the row value is not efficient.
EB: The system should have a more efficient logic to process the disk sorting when there is a border value for the row value. It should be able to sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
SR:
1. Copy the file to the destination folder.
2. Observe the current logic for processing disk sorting when there is a border value for the row value.
3. Evaluate the efficiency of the current logic.
4. Implement a more efficient logic to process the disk sorting by sorting the data directly in memory.
5. Write the sorted data to the file.
